item.description:
Nouvelle Vague is not your typical cover band -- their cover of New Order and Depeche Mode should give you a pretty good idea of what they're about:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CX_9TnAU3s8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7SI6AKhRXUA

This one from Echo and the Bunnymen is terrific too:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ywiPKmheec

I can't wait to see them live! Let's meet before the show at the Intermission Tavern (228 Tremont Street, Boston, MA 02116) at 6:15pm, I'll send my phone number and clothing description closer to the event ;-)

Tickets: http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/010048F1A0AE96C9?brand=boweryboston

Opening act: Yasmine Hamdan

It looks like Royale will have their club night on at 10pm, so it should be over by then -- might move to Toad at that point (see other meetup).
item.name: Nouvelle Vague @ Royale
